```{r, message = FALSE}
library(ISLR)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(broom)
library(ggplot2)
library(splines)
library(tidymodels)
tidymodels_prefer()
```


```{r, message = FALSE}
COVID_State <- read_csv("COVID - State - Daily.csv")

Employment_State <- read_csv("Employment - State - Daily.csv")

Mobility_State <- read_csv("Google Mobility - State - Daily.csv")
  
Spending_State <- read_csv("Affinity - State - Daily.csv")
```


```{r}
COVID_State$Date<-as.Date(with(COVID_State,paste(year,month,day,sep="-")),"%Y-%m-%d")

Employment_State$Date<-as.Date(with(Employment_State,paste(year,month,day,sep="-")),"%Y-%m-%d")

Mobility_State$Date<-as.Date(with(Mobility_State,paste(year,month,day,sep="-")),"%Y-%m-%d")

Spending_State$Date<-as.Date(with(Spending_State,paste(year,month,day,sep="-")),"%Y-%m-%d")


full_data <- merge(COVID_State, Employment_State, by=c("Date","statefips"))
full_data <- merge(full_data, Mobility_State, by=c("Date","statefips"))
full_data <- merge(full_data, Spending_State, by=c("Date","statefips"))

head(full_data)
```
